alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:26PM MST until July 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 600 PM MST. * At 525 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Kirkland, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Yava and Kirkland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
